events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a Refund request based on customer's description about receiving the wrong item.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect order.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you received the wrong item and Iâ€™m here to help you sort this out promptly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so that I can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 123456789 and attached a photo showing that I received a different product than what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your payment method immediately and you can keep the incorrect item at no cost.
That sounds good, thank you very much for resolving this quickly and for letting me keep the item.
Your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure your refund was received and that you are satisfied with how we handled your request.
As we have not heard back, we will now close this case. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
